channel.title: [PI] How do I add a Maxhit for my staff of the dead
channel.description: I want to edit the maxhit for the staff of the dead with ice barrage. How I would I be able to edit this? I don't have any staff damage maxhits in my combatassistant class.

item.title: [PI] How do I add a Maxhit for my staff of the dead
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:546011”]Max hit shouldn’t be a static number. It should be based on the stats of the weapon. Meaning a weapon with +20 str would do better than one with +15 (not counting other variables etc). Because if you made each one have a max, even if your player was “geared through the teeth” he wouldn’t be able to hit his max number because the staff only allows you to hit like 25 or etc.

I’d look into where your server handles magic damage so you can get an idea how it works.[/quote]

Good thing I dont have that then lol, I’ll try increasing the magic bonus for it and Ill see if that works.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do I add a Maxhit for my staff of the dead

item.title: [PI] How do I add a Maxhit for my staff of the dead
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Max hit shouldn’t be a static number. It should be based on the stats of the weapon. Meaning a weapon with +20 str would do better than one with +15 (not counting other variables etc). Because if you made each one have a max, even if your player was “geared through the teeth” he wouldn’t be able to hit his max number because the staff only allows you to hit like 25 or etc.

I’d look into where your server handles magic damage so you can get an idea how it works.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do I add a Maxhit for my staff of the dead
